title: A board showing the location of such public parking space should he displayed at suitable places by the Planning Authority
clause_text: A board showing the location of such public parking space should he displayed at suitable places by the Planning Authority. Area covered under such parking shall not be counted towards FSI consumption.
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: A board showing the location of such public parking space should he displayed at suitable places by the Planning Authority.
